title: Peanut Butter and Jam Cheesecake
ingredients: ['85g digestive biscuits, broken into crumbs', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons melted unsalted butter', '450g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '5 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '4 eggs', '125ml milk', '160g any flavour fruit jam']
